statements: SELECT * FROM energy_usage;
SELECT id, sensor_id, energy_consumed FROM energy_usage WHERE occupancy_status = TRUE;
SELECT sensor_id, energy_consumed FROM energy_usage ORDER BY energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT id, sensor_id FROM energy_usage WHERE energy_consumed > 100;
SELECT * FROM energy_usage ORDER BY sensor_id ASC, energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_usage WHERE energy_consumed > 100 ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM energy_usage WHERE occupancy_status = true GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT id, sensor_id FROM energy_usage WHERE energy_consumed BETWEEN 50 AND 200 AND occupancy_status = false ORDER BY id;
SELECT DISTINCT sensor_id FROM energy_usage WHERE energy_consumed < 50;
SELECT * FROM energy_usage WHERE occupancy_status = true AND energy_consumed > 200 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM OccupancyPatterns ORDER BY occupancy_start_time DESC, room_number ASC;
SELECT id, room_number, energy_consumed FROM EnergyUsage WHERE energy_consumed > 100 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT id, room_number, occupancy_status FROM OccupancyPatterns WHERE room_number = 101;
SELECT id, energy_consumed, date FROM EnergyUsage ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM OccupancyPatterns WHERE occupancy_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM OccupancyPatterns WHERE room_number = 101 AND occupancy_status = TRUE;
SELECT room_number, occupancy_status, occupancy_start_time FROM OccupancyPatterns WHERE occupancy_end_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, energy_consumed, date FROM EnergyUsage WHERE energy_consumed > 50 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT room_number, COUNT(*) AS occupancy_count FROM OccupancyPatterns GROUP BY room_number HAVING occupancy_count > 2;
SELECT room_number, AVG(energy_consumed) AS avg_energy_consumed FROM EnergyUsage GROUP BY room_number ORDER BY avg_energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_usage;
SELECT room_name, occupancy_status FROM occupancy WHERE occupancy_status = true;
SELECT id, efficiency_rating FROM efficiency_metrics ORDER BY efficiency_rating DESC;
SELECT energy_value, timestamp FROM energy_usage WHERE energy_value > 100;
SELECT room_name, last_updated FROM occupancy ORDER BY last_updated;
SELECT * FROM energy_usage WHERE energy_value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT room_name, occupancy_status FROM occupancy WHERE occupancy_status = TRUE;
SELECT efficiency_rating FROM efficiency_metrics WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-02-01';
SELECT id, energy_value FROM energy_usage WHERE occupancy_id = 3;
SELECT room_name, efficiency_rating FROM occupancy o JOIN efficiency_metrics e ON o.id = e.id;
SELECT * FROM occupancy_patterns WHERE room_id = 1;
SELECT room_id, occupancy_status FROM occupancy_patterns WHERE occupancy_count > 5;
SELECT id, room_id, energy_consumed FROM energy_usage ORDER BY energy_timestamp DESC;
SELECT room_id, occupancy_event FROM occupancy_logs WHERE occupancy_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT room_id, efficiency_score, efficiency_timestamp FROM efficiency_metrics WHERE efficiency_score < 0.5;
SELECT * FROM occupancy_patterns WHERE room_id = 1;
SELECT room_id, occupancy_count, occupancy_timestamp FROM occupancy_patterns WHERE occupancy_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM energy_usage ORDER BY energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT efficiency_score, efficiency_timestamp FROM efficiency_metrics WHERE room_id = 2;
SELECT room_id, occupancy_event FROM occupancy_logs WHERE occupancy_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM occupancy_pattern ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT room_id, occupancy_status FROM occupancy_pattern WHERE occupancy_count > 5;
SELECT room_id, temperature, humidity, light_intensity FROM room_data WHERE temperature >= 25;
SELECT room_id, electricity_consumption FROM energy_usage WHERE electricity_consumption < 100;
SELECT room_id, efficiency_score FROM efficiency_metrics ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM occupancy_pattern ORDER BY time_of_change DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT room_id, occupancy_status FROM occupancy_pattern WHERE occupancy_count > 10 AND room_id = 3;
SELECT room_id, temperature, humidity FROM room_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 70 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT room_id, efficiency_score FROM efficiency_metrics WHERE efficiency_score > 0.8 ORDER BY room_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT room_id, electricity_consumption FROM energy_usage WHERE electricity_consumption < 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
